 */export var SHOW_OFFLINE_NOTICE='SHOW_OFFLINE_NOTICE';export var SET_BIG_OFFLINE_NOTICE='SET_BIG_OFFLINE_NOTICE';/**
 * Show offline notice.
 * @param  {boolean} msgType
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/Offline/Action/showOfflineNotice
 */export var showOfflineNotice=middleware(function(isOffline){return{type:SHOW_OFFLINE_NOTICE,isOffline:isOffline};},"Store/Offline/Action/showOfflineNotice\n");/**
